    "PUT",
    "/_connector/my-connector/_features",
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    body={
        "features": {
            "document_level_security": {
                "enabled": True
            },
            "incremental_sync": {
                "enabled": True
            },
            "sync_rules": {
                "advanced": {
                    "enabled": False
                },
                "basic": {
                    "enabled": True
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
